abstract: Standard Chartered, the big Asia-focused bank, has decided to let its employees choose either an iPhone or a BlackBerry as their official work smartphone, Reuters reported.
snippet: Standard Chartered, the big Asia-focused bank, has decided to let its employees choose either an iPhone or a BlackBerry as their official work smartphone, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: For a Wall Street financier, few tools are as essential as the BlackBerry. Fingers are all but glued to the device’s plastic keyboard, eyes fixated on its blinking message light.

headline.main: In iPhone-BlackBerry War, Standard Chartered Chooses Choice
